name: linttool
description: ESLint Tool with custom project specific rules including ExtJS best practices. By default the report shows only errors and suppresses warnings. To enable warnings, remove the --quite flag from lint scripts below (line 8)

scriptsComments.lint: Runs ESLint with Watch utility and scans the modified files for lint errors, --quiet:flag to disable warnings and show only errors, --w: flag watches for changes and automatically re-runs lint on changed files

author: Kumar Shwetabh
